Comment: Here's a gift link: [https://www.nytimes.com/2025/04/30/us/politics/trump-deportations-venezuela-el-salvador.html?unlocked\_article\_code=1.Dk8.kZEv.WqZTSxhdv-E9&smid=url-share](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/04/30/us/politics/trump-deportations-venezuela-el-salvador.html?unlocked_article_code=1.Dk8.kZEv.WqZTSxhdv-E9&smid=url-share)  I just want to point out that this is the type of reporting the media should do more of. The public needs this detailed reporting. It's shameful that the deal with El Salvador has gone on behind the scenes, but thankfully we do know some details thanks to this and other reports!  I don't even know what to comment on specifically. There are so many details here and I'm just going through it. But it's clear that both the US government and Salvadoran government are... less than honest.  I don't have high hopes that anyone will be held accountable for any of it, but I know that Judges Boasberg and Xinis are in the process. Hope they don't give up.
Author: sachiprecious
